about_the_game:
Survive the harsh winter


With new lands come new challenges. You must prepare for the coming winter, store up all the food & water you require, and do what’s needed to keep your settlement alive! With time, perhaps, you can learn to conquer the cold and keep your economy running year-round.

Recover forgotten knowledge


The lost Library of this land is why you settled here. It holds the key to everything you’ve lost, and you will set yourself to the difficult task of learning all its secrets. An enormous research tree of new buildings, tools, efficiencies, resource unlocks, heating systems, work ranges, zones, and more. Everything hinges on your ability to unlock the secrets of the past. Balancing your short-term needs with long-term planning is paramount to your survival.

Manage a complex economy


Your logistical & economic skills are essential to plan out your settlement successfully. All resources will need to be moved across a complex web of depots to be used by your buildings (there are no magic central inventories here!), and placing your production chains too far apart could be the difference between the settlement’s life & death. You should build new houses to grow your settlement, but beware of hidden costs! If you can’t meet the needs of your population, your settlement may pay the ultimate price! And the threat of the coming winter is always present.

Expand & explore new zones


You will need to scour this new land and its different zones, each with its own resources, feel & importance. However, these zones are blocked, and you will first need to contribute resources, risk lives & dedicate yourself to get these ancient gates open.

Experience time travel in a pleasant world


Experience hours that feel like minutes as your settlement survives, grows & thrives in the aesthetically cheerful world of Forgotten Vale. Your land will be yours. Procedural generation provides enormous variety and endless possibility to tell your individual story of a settlement and its people.

And more

  • Your settlers will age, get married, have children & pass away.
  • You will meet foreign traders and acquire unique resources through the summer whilst relying on their provision of the basic necessities during the winter to escape bad situations.
  • Impactful weather that commands the entire environment and boosts/hinders crop & tree growth.
  • No grids! Be free of technical limits and build roads & angle buildings to create the perfect settlement.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: 6th Gen Intel or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 11
  • Processor: 8th Gen Intel or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 980 Ti or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Build, Research, Survive, Expand. This town-building strategy game will envelop you in a world of progress, logistics, efficiency, resources & needs as you fight to prepare for winter and unlock the secrets of this deceptively cheerful wilderness.
